TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit InstructionEncoder extends System.ValueType

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Reflection.Metadata.BlobBuilder codeBuilder, class System.Reflection.Metadata.Ecma335.ControlFlowBuilder controlFlowBuilder) cil managed
Public Sub New (codeBuilder As BlobBuilder, Optional controlFlowBuilder As ControlFlowBuilder = Nothing)

Docs.param: Builder to write encoded instructions to.
Builder tracking labels, branches and exception handlers. Must be specified to be able to use some of the control-flow factory methods of , such as , , etc.
Docs.summary: Creates an encoder backed by code and control-flow builders.

Docs.param: Label of the target location in instruction stream.
Docs.exception:
is not a branch instruction.
-or-
was not defined by this encoder.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ControlFlowBuilder As ControlFlowBuilder

Docs.summary: Builder tracking labels, branches and exception handlers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
If `null` the encoder doesn't support construction of control flow.

Docs.summary: Associates specified label with the current IL offset.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
A single label may be marked multiple times, the last offset wins.

Docs.exception: was not defined by this encoder.
